name: Darryl R. FREY, Appellant, v. Charles M. PANZA and Hampton Township, Appellees

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: Darryl R. FREY, Appellant, v. Charles M. PANZA and Hampton Township, Appellees.

casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 653
Darryl R. FREY, Appellant, v. Charles M. PANZA and Hampton Township, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
Reargument Denied Nov. 8, 1978.
W. Thomas Laffey, Jr., Nernberg & Nernberg, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
John C. Mohan, Robert R. Graff, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
